meanings.definition: Relating to or existing between provinces.
meanings.sent1: The interprovincial trade agreement benefited many provinces.
meanings.sent2: The interprovincial bus service made travel between provinces easier.
meanings.sent3: The interprovincial picnic brought together families from different provinces.
meanings.sent4: The interprovincial bridges symbolize the unity among provinces.
meanings.sent5: The interprovincial highway showcased the diverse landscapes of each province.

meanings.sent1: The interprovincial sports competition attracted athletes from various provinces.
meanings.sent2: The interprovincial railway system linked distant provinces together.
meanings.sent3: The interprovincial potluck dinner featured dishes from all provinces.
meanings.sent4: The interprovincial internet network connected people across provinces seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The interprovincial pipeline transported resources efficiently between provinces.
